title: SMC_NC_GArgumentValue (Union)
text:
TYPE SMC_NC_GArgumentValue : UNION
Represents a value of a variable or expression in the G-Code.
See also
SMC_GVar_Type
.

rows.Name: bValue
rows.Comment: Value for arguments of type T_BOOL

rows.Name: fValue
rows.Comment: Value for arguments of type T_LREAL

rows.Name: sValue
rows.Comment: Value for arguments of type T_STRING
